subsection_content:
Narrow foreskin causes urine to stagnate, making hygiene difficult, easily causing infections of the glans, foreskin, urinary tract, and affecting the kidneys. In this case, the foreskin slides up but cannot return to its normal position, forming a constriction that will tighten the glans, causing the foreskin to swell and cause pain, called foreskin stenosis. This is an emergency that requires immediate intervention.
Foreskin stenosis can lead to penile cancer... In addition, in adulthood, foreskin stenosis can cause pain in the penis when erect, hindering the erection process.

In this case, the foreskin slides up but cannot return to its normal position, forming a constriction that will tighten the glans, causing the foreskin to swell and cause pain, called foreskin stenosis. This is an emergency that requires immediate intervention.
Foreskin stenosis can lead to penile cancer... In addition, in adulthood, foreskin stenosis can cause pain in the penis when erect, hindering the erection process.
